Hero.title: A Steady Stream of Targeted Clients from Google Ads
Hero.subtitle: I set up profitable ad campaigns. Stop wasting budget on empty clicks—get transparent analytics, lower cost-per-lead, and measurable sales growth.

setup.title: Setup From Scratch
setup.desc: Creation of effective campaigns to attract new clients from day one.

audit.title: Account Audit
audit.desc: In-depth analysis of current ad campaigns and growth opportunities.

management.title: Campaign Management
management.desc: Regular optimization and budget scaling to hit your target metrics.

local.title: Google Maps Ads
local.desc: Attracting potential clients dynamically mapping to your physical business radius.

case_1.title: Freight Transport in Kyiv
case_1.desc: Setup from scratch. Leads started coming in the first week. Connected tagmanager, GA, ringostat. Client got max promo code of 30,000 UAH.

case_2.title: MRI Clinic in Kyiv
case_2.desc: Audit, setup of analytics and call tracking. Account restructuring. Working together into the second year.

case_3.title: Flower Shop in Odesa
case_3.desc: Google Maps Ads (2km radius). Generated steady visitor map-actions. Client received a 10,000 UAH GA promo code.

case_4.title: Nail Studio in Copenhagen
case_4.desc: Client from Ukraine opened a salon in Denmark. After an audit and proper setup, started getting steady leads.

Contacts.title: Ready to increase your sales?
Contacts.desc: Leave a request or write to me in a convenient messenger. I will contact you to discuss your project.

form.name: Your name
form.message_placeholder: Tell me briefly about your business
form.success: Request sent successfully! I will contact you shortly.
form.error: An error occurred while sending. Please try again later or text me in the messenger.
